text: Randy Jones (January 23, 1944 - June 23, 2016) was a British-born American jazz drummer.Obituary. Find-a-Grave. Retrieved on July 2, 2016. He was born in Berkshire, England. He was known for his albums M.F. Horn (1970), M.F. Horn Two (1972), M.F. Horn 3 (1973), and M.F. Horn 4&5: Live At Jimmy's.Discography. AllMusic. Retrieved on July 2, 2016. Jones died at the Calvary Hospital in the Bronx on June 23, 2016 from heart failure at the age of 72.Obituary. New York Times. title: Randy Jones (drummer)
